## ExtrudedPolygonTechniqueParams.constantHeight property

If `true`<!-- -->, the height of the extruded buildings will not be modified by the mercator projection distortion that happens around the poles.

 `false`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constantHeight?: boolean;
```
